AUTHOR: ZeLarpMaster#0924
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing my ClientModification cog.
This also allows you to make the help messages autodelete after a configurable amount of time.
NAME: ClientModification
SHORT: Make help messages autodelete after a while and enable obscure features for my other cogs.
DESCRIPTION:
Allows you to configure an amount of time after which help messages will self-destruct.
Also, mainly used to enable obscure features on my other cogs.
